title: Wanting Ranked Duo Partner, (You = Support) (Me = ADC) Master Elo
body: Title sums it up, I am looking for a **support** who is going to be on frequently in next couple weeks. Needs a **microphone** for voice communications, and is around **master elo** so challenger or down to about diamond 2. Want to play lane smart, safe / poke, and aggressive when given good opportunity. Team fights peeling me while does damage etc. IGN obviously **"Abyss Commando"**

replies.body:
Team fights peeling me while does damage.

Are you looking for a support or a carry? pick one.
Only a bronze 5 would be confused.
